column4: Ectospasm, THe Desktop guide says the system is closed by default, is there a way to open it?
Ectospasm, It works in WinXP (Yes, I'm Microsoft Handicapped)
Ectospasm, It doesn't ping in either direction, (Network Unreachable) and I have no idea what Kernel module I have.
Ectospasm, I do have the files I downloaded from the NIC Manufacturer for Linux.
sudo ifdown eth0, then sudo ifup eth0
someone may be able to suggest something even better
response to ifdown is, "RTNETLINK answers No such Process"
whats the name of the interface of your networking device?
just stick that in for eth0, i assumed that was your interface name
not sure about the file part but PID = Process ID
eth0:avah is zeroconf interface for networks that have such machines connected
i dont believe u can, isn't it a DHCP thing to broadcast on 0.0.0.0?
yeah, I believe thats DHCP implementation thing, though I could totally be off-base
